thread.title: MC denounces armed assault in opposition to candidate in Edomex

author: archyde
title: MC denounces armed assault in opposition to candidate in Edomex
text:
MEXICO CITY.- An alleged confrontation between supporters of Citizen motion (MC) and the AT left a steadiness of two fatalities in Jiquipilco, State of Mexico.
An announcement from MC says that this Sunday afternoon, the candidate’s staff Ivan Rivas He was alerted concerning the alleged buy of votes within the municipality however upon arriving on the place the place the crime was allegedly going down, he was shot.
Citizen motion He assures that the assault was carried out by PRI shock teams.
“Once we went to confirm the information, these from MC had been allegedly shot and in consequence, two teammates sadly died,” mentioned Alselmo Cruz, MC consultant earlier than the Basic recommendation of the Electoral Institute of the State of Mexico (IEEM).
Cruz additionally reported that the police had been current on the scene however “didn’t do something to keep away from the confrontation.”
The counselor added that the intervention of the Nationwide Guard and of the State Legal professional Basic’s Workplace (FGE) to find these accountable.
READ ALSO: Violence in 2024 elections. Hooded males arrested in Campeche and extra incidents
